title: Let’s Table That
description: Rad and Tippy Snooker cover interesting stories and talk with fascinating folks around Table Town.
quote: Rubbing your belly while patting your head. Science fiction or the latest teen teen craze? We investigate.
alt1: Rad and Tippy talk to Helen of Helen’s Muffins
alt3: Rad and Tippy with a rat wearing multiple hats
alt4: Rad and Tippy talk with Roy Fox and students
